name: Asteroidc
description:
A sci-fi spaceship asteroid game.

You are sent by the asteroid haters to destroy as many asteroids as you can. Don't worry if you die, they'll send another one in your place.
But, the asteroids are a group organism, the more you destroy the more they will send and the bigger and faster they'll be.

Whoever destroys the most will earn it's place on top of the Leaderboard.
